## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G18580](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G18580)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>EMB40, FASS, FASS 2, FS1, GDO, TON2</u>
- **Gene Name:** EMBRYO DEFECTIVE 40, FASS 1, GORDO, TONNEAU 2
- **Description:**   tonneau 2 (TON2);(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)

## Plant Ontology Annotations:
   - [PO:0009005](https://browser.planteome.org/amigo/term/PO:0009005)&nbsp;---&nbsp;root&nbsp;---&nbsp;raíz (Spanish, exact), radices (exact, plural), radix (exact), 根 (Japanese, exact), aerial root (narrow), climbing root (narrow)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS8150]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;seedlings appear short and thick, compressed in the apical-basal axis (shape mutant); all pattern elements are present; number of cotyledons vary from 2 to 4; cells are round and irregularly shaped; embryos have irregular shape and arrangement of cells. (seedling lethal/embryo defective).
   - [CS84613]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;developmental arrest of mutant embryos occurs at linear cotyledon stage; (formerly emb40); green seeds; green embryo; 19.9% mutant.

   - [root](/tags/root/)
